original_title: Top Gear - Best of the Stig
overview: Some say he invented Betamax, and its subsequent failure is the reason why he never talks. All we know is that this DVD is a tribute to the most epic Stig moments of all time. Includes the greatest power laps, blitzing an Apollo, drifting the Caterham R500 and THE ONLY RECORDED STIG PRANG IN A KOENIGSEGGGGGGGGGGGG.
title: Top Gear - Best of the Stig
